verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who Can Cheer The Heart Like Jesus, By His Presence All Divine? True And Tender, Pure And Precious, O How Blest To Call Him Mine!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love Of Christ So Freely Given, Grace Of God Beyond Degree, Mercy Higher Than The Heaven, Deeper Than The Deepest Sea.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What A Wonderful Redemption! Never Can A Mortal Know How My Sin, Though Red Like Crimson, Can Be Whiter Than The Snow.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}By The Crystal Flowing River With The Ransomed I Will Sing, And Forever And Forever Praise And Glorify The King.{/lang-eng}
